Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Langley
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via: 79th,  Cottage Grove, 83rd, King, and 79th, due to, street blockage, near 79th/Langley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: 79th,  Cottage Grove, 83rd, King, and 79th, due to, street blockage, near 79th/Langley.

Allow extra travel time.
